properties.entry: UPDATE TRAINING SET COUNT = COUNT +1 WHERE TRAINING_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TRAINING WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM(SELECT TRAINING_NO,TRAINING_TITLE,MEMBER_NAME,RECORD_DATE,COUNT,OCSTATUS FROM TRAINING T JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE T.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY RECORD_DATE DESC)S) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT TRAINING_NO, MEMBER_NAME, TRAINING_TITLE, COUNT, TRAINING_NAME, SHOES_NO, TRAINING_DATE, RECORD_DATE, TRAINING_PLACE, TRAINING_TIME, TRAINING_GOAL, TRAINING_DISTANCE, T.WEIGHT WEIGHT, TRAINING_CONTENT, OCSTATUS FROM TRAINING T JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN TRAINING_CATEGORY TC ON (T.TRAINING_KEY = TC.TRAINING_KEY) WHERE TRAINING_NO = ? AND T.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO,FILE_NAME,FILE_RENAME,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ?

UPDATE TRAINING SET TRAINING_TITLE = ? ,TRAINING_KEY = ? ,TRAINING_DATE = ? ,TRAINING_PLACE = ? ,TRAINING_TIME = ? ,TRAINING_GOAL = ? ,TRAINING_DISTANCE = ? ,WEIGHT = ? ,TRAINING_CONTENT = ? ,OCSTATUS = ? WHERE TRAINING_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET FILE_NAME = ? ,FILE_RENAME = ? WHERE FILE_NO = ?
UPDATE TRAINING SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE TRAINING_NO = ?
SELECT REPLY_CONTENT ,MEMBER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.REPLY_WRITER = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.REF_TNO = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_CONTENT = ? AND REPLY_WRITER = ?
UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_CONTENT = ? WHERE REPLY_CONTENT = ? AND REF_TNO = ? AND REPLY_WRITER = ?
